alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 5:22PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BRADFORD... SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM AND SOUTHERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EST... At 522 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawthorne, or 8 miles southwest of Melrose, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keystone Heights, Melrose, Hawthorne, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Rochelle, Camp Blanding, Melrose Landing, and Orange Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Western Clay; Western Putnam
